author: andreas
content: Yeah, long gone are the days when HP was something special. I'm not sure, maybe getting rid of the PC business (and thus undoing the merger with Compaq) will be healthy. But then, maybe not. I guess if I ever again buy a printer (I have an HP but don't use it), it will be an Epson. Printing is at their core and they seem to be the only company in the business with continuity. I may be wrong though.
